text1: Borrow mEUR against ETH and MATIC at 0% interest. mEUR is overcollateralized by chain-native cryptocurrencies. Designed to release authority-independent EURO liquidity to DeFi.
title2: ERTY token — rewards for liquidity providers with no governance
text2: Hold ERTY token to be eligible to the share of Purity fees. Provide liquidity for mEUR and get rewards in ERTY token. Earn by providing USD-EUR liquidity for the international market of over $500 billion volume per day.
